long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.2.15) Gecko/20110303 Thunderbird/3.1.9
Everytime I open tbird, same messages download(over 200) along with new ones, including all the junk mail. Nothing is going into junk mail folder unless I put it there. I am getting frustrated at having to take so much time marking over 200 messages as junk everytime I oopen! And I just re-installed from cnet a safe version, I thought!
Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1.reinstalled 2.open t bird( in safe run!) 3.same old junk messages show up in inbox along with new ones Actual Results: same
Expected Results: duh, how about junk mail actually going into junk mailbox by learning and once a message is sent to junk mail, how about staying there?
